revised_title: Order-Disorder Statistics: A Two-Dimensional Model with First and Second Interactions
tldr: The authors study a two-dimensional model of a lattice with first and second neighbor interactions, discussing the statistics of the rectangular lattice and its applications to various physical problems, such as ferromagnetism, binary alloys, and adsorbed monolayers. They derive low-temperature series for different cases of interactions and estimate the transition points for the model.
